actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend Title 13 of the U.S. Code to provide for adjusted and accurate Decennial Census figures.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Commerce to adjust the population figures obtained in the decennial census by using appropriate statistical methods to remedy any undercount.

titles.title: A bill to amend Title 13 of the U.S. Code to provide for adjusted and accurate Decennial Census figures.
